Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends provisions relating to the mortgage tax in the county of Yates
Summary: Extends provisions relating to the mortgage tax in the county of Yates until December 1, 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 366 of the laws of 2005, amending the tax law relating to authorizing the county of Yates to impose a county recording tax on obligations secured by a mortgage on real property, in relation to extending the provisions of such chapter
